an3.103:1.1: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodha anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
an3.103:1.2: ‘ko nu kho loke assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan’ti?
an3.103:1.4: ‘yam kho lokam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam loke assado.
an3.103:1.5: Yam loko anicco dukkho viparinamadhammo, ayam loke adinavo.
an3.103:1.6: Yo loke chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam loke nissaranan’ti.
an3.103:1.7: Yavakivancaham, bhikkhave, evam lokassa assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nabbhannasim, neva tavaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya ‘anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti paccannasim.
an3.103:1.8: Yato ca khvaham, bhikkhave, evam lokassa assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam abbhannasim, athaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya ‘anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti paccannasim.
an3.103:1.10: ‘akuppa me vimutti, ayamantima jati, natthi dani punabbhavo’”ti.
